parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View 

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sorts all children, including trees deriving from given path.  Value of [[CT_TREE|Tree View]] entries is used for sorting.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control [[tvSortByValueAll]] [path, reversed]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Path to start sorting from

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> reversed: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to reverse sort it.

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>control [[tvSortByValueAll]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], [[false]]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Sorts the complete [[CT_TREE|Tree View]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSort]] [[tvSortByValue]] [[tvSortAll]]
</value></part></template></root>
